entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY ENDED, Indian Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:02 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Indian Head AAFC 9:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
Temperature: -11.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -14.5°C
Wind: N 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 6:23 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:23 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:23 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
